mdRecord.dcterms:title: Family Correspondence and Personal Letter Sent from Fairfax Station from Capt. Stigleman
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Family correspondence, personal letter dated September 30, 1861, to “My Dear Wife,” sent from Fairfax Station from Capt. Stigleman. 1 original piece.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Records and correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
